name: ColdFusion: Avoid Scripts with more then XX Lines of Code
description: Scripts should not have more than X lines of code. The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all Scripts with more than X lines of code It provides the following information:
- Script full name
- Number of lines of code
rationale: Large Scripts are more difficult to understand, and are a sign of a bad modularity of the code
remediation: Review the design of the Script to reduce its size
